Title: Valentine
Overview: Four friends start to receive morbid Valentine cards and realise they are being stalked by someone they had spurned 13 years ago. A masked killer is on the loose and Valentine's day is soon approaching.
Tagline: Remember that kid everyone ignored on Valentine’s Day? He remembers you.
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, NPV Entertainment, Warner Bros.
Cast: Denise Richards, David Boreanaz, Marley Shelton
